projects.title: Inspiration Board
projects.description: The Inspiration Board is a visually stunning and interactive web application designed to help users collect, organize, and share their creative ideas and inspiration

projects.title: Task List API
projects.description: The Task List API is a user-friendly web service for managing to-do lists. It uses RESTful architecture to support CRUD operations on tasks, with secure authentication and authorization to protect user data.

projects.title: Chat Log
projects.description: Chat Log is a chat messenger-style application that displays a log of chat messages between two people, using static data from a JSON file

projects.title: Weather Report
projects.description: Weather Report is a fun, small weather app that focuses on displaying the weather. This application set the weather using user interaction and get the weather from a 3rd party API, OpenWeather

projects.title: Hello Books API
projects.description: The Hello Books API is a user-friendly web service for giving us access to a database with information on books. It uses RESTful architecture to support CRUD operations on Books, with secure authentication and authorization to protect user data.
